mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHATTING_ROOM CR JOIN CHATTING_MEMBER_LIST CML ON CR.NO = CML.CHATTING_ROOM_NO WHERE CML.MEMBER_NO = #{mno}

SELECT CR.NO ,CR.NAME ,CR.IMG ,CR.MASTER_NO ,M.NO AS MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.PROFILE AS MEMBER_PROFILE FROM CHATTING_ROOM CR JOIN CHATTING_MEMBER_LIST CML ON CR.NO = CML.CHATTING_ROOM_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON CML.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CR.NO = #{no}

SELECT M.NAME AS FRIEND_NAME ,M.NO AS FRIEND_NO ,M.PROFILE AS FRIEND_PROFILE FROM FRIEND F JOIN MEMBER M ON F.FRIEND_NO = M.NO WHERE F.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
AND M.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
SELECT * FROM(SELECT NOFROM CHATTING_ROOMWHERE MASTER_NO = #{masterNo}ORDER BY NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT CM.CONTENT , CM.SEND_TIME,M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME ,M.PROFILE MEMBER_PROFILE FROM CHATTING_MESSAGE CM JOIN MEMBER M ON CM.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CHATTING_ROOM_NO = #{no} ORDER BY CM.SEND_TIME ASC
